This website is AudioEye enabled and is being optimized for accessibility. To open the AudioEye Toolbar, press "shift + =". Some assistive technologies may require the use of a passthrough function before this keystroke. For more information, activate the button labeled "Explore your accessibility options".

City Council
============

![Council Members ](https://www.cityofwimberley.com/ImageRepository/Document?documentID=2197)

**### Wimberley Mayor and City Council**Left to Right: David Cohen, Bob Clark, Bo Bowman, Chris Sheffield, Rebecca Minnick, Jim Chiles

### [Contact Us](https://www.cityofwimberley.com/Directory.aspx)

1. #### City Council

   **Physical Address**
   View Map   
   221 Stillwater Drive  
   Wimberley, TX 78676

     


   221 Stillwater Drive Wimberley TX 78676

   [Directions](https://www.google.com/maps/place/221+Stillwater+Drive++Wimberley+TX+78676 "Open location on Google Maps")

   Mayor

   Place One Council Member / Mayor Pro Tem

   Place Four Council Member

   #### David Cohen

   Place Five Council Member

   [Email David Cohen](mailto:place5@cityofwimberley.com)

   [More Information](https://www.cityofwimberley.com/directory.aspx?eid=24)

City of Wimberley City Council meetings are held on the first and third Thursdays of each month and meetings begin at 6 pm.

[Governance Policy and Rules of Procedure (Amended August 15, 2019) (PDF)](https://www.cityofwimberley.com/DocumentCenter/View/623/City-Council-Governance-and-Rules-of-Procedure-Amended-08-15-19pdf-PDF)
